resources.string: Norwegian lives in the first house.
English lives in the Red house.
Green house is on the left side of the White house.
Man who lives in the Green house drinks Coffee.
Man who smokes Pall Mall creates Birds.
Man who lives in the Yellow House smokes Dunhill.
Man who lives in the middle house drinks milk.
Man who smokes Blends lives next to the one with Cats.
Man who creates Horses lives next to the one who smokes Dunhill.
Man who smokes BlueMaster drinks Beer.
Norwegian lives next to the Blue house.
Man who smokes Blends is the neighbor of the one who drinks Water.
Please click BACK again to exit
You need to restart the app to see the changes. Do you want to restart now?
You have completed all the stages of the challenge by showing that you are a skilled person. \n\nWould you like to start a new game now?
Do you really want to leave?

Game Instructions
-----------------------------

Albert Einstein created this IQ test (logical reasoning) in the last century and stated that 98% of the world's population is not able to solve it.


» Basic rules for solving the test

1. There are 5 houses of different colors;
2. In each house lives a person of a different nationality;
3. These 5 owners drink different drinks, smoke different types of cigarettes and have a certain pet;
4. Neither of them have the same animal, smoke the same cigarette, or drink the same drink.
5. You must comply with all 15 rules to win.


» Content of the columns

1st line: color
2nd line: nationality
3rd line: drink
4th line: cigarette
5th line: animal
If you still do not know how to play, you can always consult the help menu.
You can swap the houses by holding and dragging over the name of the house.
